def priority(item: float, bins: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    """Returns priority with which we want to add item to each bin.

    Args:
        item: Size of item to be added to the bin.
        bins: Array of capacities for each bin.

    Return:
        Array of same size as bins with priority score of each bin.
    """
    
    def calculate_priority(item: float, bin_capacity: float) -> float:
        priority = 1
        
        if item <= bin_capacity / 2:
            priority = 1 + item / bin_capacity * 2
        elif item <= bin_capacity:
            priority = 1 + item / bin_capacity
        else:
            remaining_item = item - bin_capacity
            priority = 1 + np.log(item / bin_capacity)
            
            while remaining_item > 0:
                if remaining_item > bin_capacity:
                    priority += np.sqrt(remaining_item / bin_capacity)
                    remaining_item -= bin_capacity
                else:
                    priority += remaining_item / bin_capacity
                    remaining_item = 0
        
        return priority
    
    item_arr = np.full_like(bins, item)
    remaining_space = bins - item_arr

    priorities = np.zeros_like(bins)

    for i in range(len(bins)):
        priorities[i] = calculate_priority(item, bins[i])

    return priorities
